content.rendered:
Directed by Faraz Haider

Written by Shrikant Bhasi. Neel Chakraborty. Faraz Haider. Narendra Jagte. Piyush Mishra

Star Divyendu Sharma (Ajay). Anupriya Goenka (Jhumki). Anant Vidhaat Sharma (Sameer). Inaamulhaq (Pappan Khan).Iftekhar Mahmud .Rest of cast listed alphabetically:. Vijay Acharya (Mandi Agent #2). Khaul Ahmed (Recovery Agent #2). Akhlad (Chaiwala). Asad Alvi (Beggar). Ashi (Jhumki’s Friend). Habeeb Azmi (Sarpanch). Pawan Barjatya (Bandwala #2). Seema Bhatt (Matchmaker). Reena Bisht (Babban’s Wife). Manu Rishi Chadha (Bijju Hudda). Neel Chakraborty (Gautam). Dilshad (Agent Vinod). Vishal Goswami (Gitika’s Brother). Alok Guch (Tempo Guy). Sanjay Gurbaxani (Ajay’s Boss). Faraz Haider (Man on Stage). Heet (Shilpa’s Brother). Farrukh Jaffar (Dadi). Anoop Joshi (Bank Manager). Juhi (Ramda’s Daughter). Brijendra Kala (Dubey Ji). Raja Khan (Kishanlal’s Pehelwan). Waseem Khan (Mad Man). Avantika Khatri (Priyanka Khurana (credit only)). Ravi Lal (Gram Panchayat Member). Mahesh (Balwai Friend #1). Ashi Malviya (Anupriya’s friend). Javed Mian (Kishanlal’s Pehelwan #2). Aamir Naqvi (Studio Guy). Aamir Naqvi (Studio Guy). Avinash Nemade (Mandi Agent #1). Mukesh Pachode (Gatta). Isha Parekh (Gitika’s Mom). Ashok Parmar (Ajay’s Client). Imran Rasheed (Ramdass). Manoj Rawat (Recovery Agent #1). Adesh Sakpal (Cab Driver). Naushad Anees Salmani (Irshad Bandwala). Santhosh (Balwai Friend #2). Kamlesh Sawant (Bhau). Deepak Sharma (Ticket Checker). Manish Sharma (Balwai). Rajesh Sharma (Kishan). Ritooja Shinde (Shilpa). Shivangi (Ramda’s Wife). Dr. Chandresh Shukla (Jyotish). Ajay Singh (Shopkeeper). Aparajit Singh (RON). Balwinder Singh (Babban). Vivek Singh (Capt. Rajat). Sonalwala (Receptionist). Atul Srivastava (Ajay’s Father). Suchetha (Shilpa’s Mom). Bipin Suresh Surve (Bhau Sidekick). Daup Tahhil (Shilpa’s Father). Sanjay Udeshi (Gitika’s Dad). Shabnam Vadhera (Ajay’s Mom). Vasant (South Indian). Arun Verma (Sanjay’s Boss). Chandrabhaan Yadav (Office Clerk)

Language Hindi

Producers Arif Ahmed. Vaishali Sarwankar

Production Carnival Motion Pictures
